statements: SELECT * FROM retention_policy
SELECT user_id, personal_info, expiration_date FROM retention_policy
SELECT personal_info FROM retention_policy WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM retention_policy WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, user_id FROM retention_policy ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, user_id, personal_info, expiration_date FROM retention_policy WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM retention_policy WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT user_id, personal_info FROM retention_policy WHERE expiration_date > NOW()
SELECT id, user_id, expiration_date FROM retention_policy WHERE personal_info IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM retention_policy ORDER BY user_id, expiration_date
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM personal_data WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT id, name, email FROM users ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM personal_data WHERE expiration_date > NOW();
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM personal_data JOIN users ON personal_data.user_id = users.id WHERE users.name = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, data_type, data_value FROM personal_data WHERE expiration_date > NOW();
SELECT name, email FROM users ORDER BY name ASC, email DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy;
SELECT policy_name, expiration_date FROM data_retention_policy;
SELECT id, policy_name, expiration_date FROM data_retention_policy WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM personal_information WHERE info_type = 'address';
SELECT user_id, info_type, info_content FROM personal_information ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, id FROM data_retention_policy WHERE policy_name LIKE 'Backup%';
SELECT * FROM personal_information WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT info_type, info_content FROM personal_information WHERE expiry_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT log_id, deleted_info_id, reason FROM deletion_log ORDER BY deletion_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT user_id, data_type, data_value FROM personal_information ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 5;
SELECT log_id, action_taken, log_date FROM expiration_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT p.data_type, p.data_value, e.log_date FROM personal_information p JOIN expiration_logs e ON p.info_id = e.info_id;
SELECT u.name, COUNT(p.data_type) AS data_count FROM users u JOIN personal_information p ON u.id = p.user_id GROUP BY u.name;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies WHERE retention_period >= 10;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policies ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, dob FROM users WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT data_id, user_id, created_date FROM user_data WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, activity_description, activity_date FROM log_activity WHERE activity_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies ORDER BY policy_name DESC, retention_period ASC;
SELECT policy_name, expire_date FROM data_retention_policies WHERE retention_period > INTERVAL '30 days';
SELECT users.username, user_data.data->>'email' AS user_email FROM users JOIN user_data ON users.user_id = user_data.user_id WHERE users.dob < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY user_data.created_date DESC;

SELECT log_activity.activity_description, users.username FROM log_activity JOIN users ON log_activity.user_id = users.user_id WHERE log_activity.activity_date BETWEEN TIMESTAMP '2021-01-01' AND TIMESTAMP '2021-06-30' ORDER BY users.username ASC;

SELECT expired_data.expired_id, user_data.data->>'name' AS user_name, expired_data.deletion_date FROM expired_data JOIN user_data ON expired_data.data_id = user_data.data_id WHERE user_data.data->>'status' = 'inactive';
